rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming open space with floor-to-ceiling windows on the eastern side, allowing natural light and adhering to Vastu principles. The hall is designed as a transitional area from the outside world into the private living quarters.
rooms.vastu_note: Orientation towards the east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows along the eastern wall to enhance natural illumination and maintain a warm atmosphere. The layout encourages social interaction within the family.
rooms.vastu_note: Positioned near the center for balanced energy distribution.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, this area has floor-to-ceiling windows on one side to bring in ample natural light. The dining space is designed with a traditional Kerala touch using local motifs.
rooms.vastu_note: Located on the north side to promote positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern yet traditionally styled kitchen integrated with a central open plan. It features floor-to-ceiling windows for ventilation and natural light, enhancing both functionality and aesthetics.
rooms.vastu_note: Placed in the south-eastern quadrant to optimize energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation. The master suite includes an en-suite bathroom, closet, and sitting area.
rooms.vastu_note: Located in the northern part of the house for calmness.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: An additional bedroom designed for occasional guests. The room incorporates traditional Kerala architectural elements along with modern amenities.
rooms.vastu_note: Positioned to maintain privacy yet remain connected to the living spaces.

rooms.name: Joint Family Common Area
rooms.description: A multipurpose space for joint family gatherings and communal activities. The room features large floor-to-ceiling windows on the southern wall, blending indoor-outdoor living.
rooms.vastu_note: Centralized to foster familial bonds and harmony.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional bathroom with efficient space planning. The design includes ample storage and traditional Kerala style finishes.
rooms.vastu_note: Placed away from the main living areas to preserve privacy.
